title: Image Resizer
subtitle: tools
description: Image Resize Tool: Resize Images Easily, Quickly adjust the dimensions of your images with our Image Resize Tool.

title: Words Counter
subtitle: tools
description: The words counter tool is a simple yet useful web-based application that allows you to analyze and count the number of words, sentences, paragraphs, letters and top keywords in your text.

title: Text Replace
subtitle: tools
description: Enhance productivity with our interactive text replace tool. Easily find and replace text in a user-friendly interface.

title: Dictionary
subtitle: tools
description: Discover meanings, phonetics, and examples of words. Perfect for quick reference and enhancing your understanding on the go.

title: QR Code Generator
subtitle: tools
description: Generate custom QR codes instantly with this easy-to-use tool. Customize QR code size, colors, and correction level to suit your needs. Download your generated QR code as a PNG image for use in various applications.

title: Rich Text Editor
subtitle: tools
description: Easily edit and format text with our intuitive Online Rich Text Editor. Enjoy features like bold, italic, alignment, and more. Now includes a convenient print function for immediate document output. Perfect for enhancing content creation.

title: File Encryption
subtitle: tools
description: Protect your sensitive files with our Secure File Encryption and Decryption Tool. Upload your documents, set a password, and encrypt them with AES-GCM encryption for maximum security. Decrypt files seamlessly when needed. Enjoy a sleek, dark-themed interface designed for both usability and style.

title: Music Player
subtitle: tools
description: Our Music Player brings your favorite tunes to your fingertips with a stylish and intuitive interface. Discover and play songs in high-quality audio, complete with artist and album information displayed dynamically. Designed with a sleek dark theme for an immersive experience, our player is perfect for enjoying music on any device.

title: Simple Text Editor
subtitle: tools
description: Simple Text Editor is a user-friendly web-based text editor that allows you to create and edit text with a variety of fonts. Choose from a diverse selection of typefaces to customize your text to suit your needs.

title: Text to Speech
subtitle: tools
description: Text to Speech allows users to convert text into spoken words, with adjustable playback speed. Utilize the intuitive controls to play, pause, and stop speech synthesis, ensuring a seamless experience.
